participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and laid-back, enjoys the thrill of skateboarding and trying new tricks.
participant_1.background: i'm a skateboarder. i am always wearing a hat. my favourite skater is rob dryden. my friends are all skateboarders.

participant_2.name: Lisa
participant_2.personality: Creative and energetic, loves spending weekends dancing and engaging with dogs.
participant_2.background: i compete in dog agility classes. i hate the color orange. i went to school for chemistry but work in a bookstore. i do not care about fashion. i dance on the weekends.

content.text: hello, how are you? what do you do for a living? I am a skateboarder
that sounds like a lot of fun. do you like rob dryden? I do
I don't. Do you like cats?
I do, I like cats. what is your favourite skater? mine is rob
